data.title: What is another word for "starting line"?
data.meta_description: Find 20 synonyms for "starting line" and other similar words that you can use instead from our thesaurus..
data.text:
Need synonyms for starting line? Here's a list of similar words from our thesaurus that you can use instead.

Noun

A real or imaginary line used to mark the place from which a race starts

“I also noticed that the hill that the car rolled up was at a lower grade than the hill that the starting line was painted on.”
